tooltip: Select Queen Baga as your hero of choice.

heroSelectionDescriptionElements.tooltipText: Queen Baga focuses on improving Gohma Larva.
Allows you to summon Queen Baga, a support Hero that can spawn new units.
+1 Battalion size for Soldier Larva and Spine Larva
All Gohma structures (except for Settlements, Outposts, and Camps) spawn a half sized Battalion of Soldier Larva when destroyed.
